NAME: Train
PROTO: extern int output_flag; Expr Train(Expr expr);
DOC: Train[delay,options] shows a steam locomotive. delay time determines the speed of the train. options are "Logo","Accident","Fly" and "C51". option "Logo" shows long sl. option "Accident" shows sl with some accident. option "Fly" shows flying sl. option "C51" shows C51 type sl.
